title: Why Am I Always the Unlucky One?! - Novel Updates
author: Lu Yi Di Er   芦一荻二
description:
It’s a story about a shou who lives an especially difficult life and a gong who is so lucky that it’s detestable~
It’s a combination of sketches from the internet and the author's pathetic personal experiences and miserable college life...
It’s a short and cute story!~

Basically, Lucky Gong X Unlucky Shou
>
